column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Our young waitress was pleasant and attentive! Let's get to the important part
column2: the food. This is where points were lost. We ordered spicy ramen
column4: and crispy chicken. Spicy chicken Ramen was pretty good according to hubs. The curry was not what I expected. I'm so glad I got the small plate. It was extremely watery and hardly any chicken there. More sauce than anything. Not being satisfied
column5: I tried something else from the menu. We proceeded to order the chicken
column6: 5 pieces for starters. The chicken was so tough and dry. Tough to the point were I struggled to break off a piece. The taste? Salty as well. I was so disappointed. We might come back and try different items.
